Summary: Chubb Limited (CB) faces low legislative risk; 1 bill analyzed, 1 direct impact. Regulation may affect 0% of revenue. Indirect risk absent. Overall risk: minimal.
SummaryKeypoints: REGULATION (EU) 2024/1689 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL imposes regulation. affecting operations in European Union. with short-term implementation The legislation states: "AI systems intended to be used for risk assessment and pricing in relation to natural persons in the case of life and health insurance"
